item.title: Joint Zero-Shot Learning for Sequence Labeling and Text Classification
item.description: TARS uses a premise-hypothesis data input structure to technically transform every text classification task into a binary label space compared to previous models. This input structure enables TARS to train the same model for different corpora and eliminates the need to add a custom linear layer for each tag space. Further, this layout leverages the integration of semantic information from the label of a concrete data point.
